The other main cast members include Tom Everett Scott as Young Jack Weatherford, and Maury Chaykin as Old Jack Weatherford.

The plot of "Super" follows a small group of hardened young bikers and their girlfriends who live on an isolated farm deep in the Northern California woods. One night at this secluded farm, a small group of hardened young bikers and their girlfriends are tormented when one of the girls becomes savagely possessed and a gang of  "Rockabillies" seemingly from the 1950' s descends upon them to collect what is growing inside her.

This movie has received generally positive reviews from critics. It has also been praised for its unique blend of humor, action, and drama.

Based on the preferences you mentioned, here are some recommendations:

- Title: It's a Wonderful Life (1946) | Plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed. | Starring: Sheldon Leonard, Frank Faylen, Gloria Grahame, Lionel Barrymore, Lionel Barrymore, Donna Reed, Donna Reed, Adriana Caselotti, Thomas Mitchell

- Title: Man on Wire (2008) | Plot: A look at tightrope walker Philippe Petit' s daring, but illegal, high-wire routine performed between New York City' s World Trade Center' s twin towers in 1974, what some consider, "the artistic crime of the century". | Starring: Jean-Louis Blondeau, Paul McGill, Philippe Petit

- Title: Holes (1998) | Plot: Two young men come running out of a dark alley, leaving behind another young man with his neck stabbed. The moment Danny received the message about the murder of Itzik, his only son, his life would never again be the same. Ten years of legal proceedings and new disclosures made during that time have slowly crumbled his faith in gaining justice. Along with the pain of his loss, he realizes that only he can find the truth of what happened that night. His journey in search of the truth reveals his complex identity for the first time: a spy who worked for the security services, an Arab who converted and became a practicing Jew, a man who felt pride, respect and sympathy for a country that has absurdly and horrifyingly betrayed him.
